name: Gale Force
statusOutcome: With an almost dismissive flick of [AttackerHisOrHer] fan, [AttackerName] sends an intense gust of wind billowing towards [TargetName], knocking [TargetHimOrHer] flat on [TargetHisOrHer] back and [TargetHimOrHer] gasping for air.|f|CallCombatEventAndScene|/|TenguCombatEvents|/|Start Face Sit|n|
statusMiss: With an almost dismissive flick of [AttackerHisOrHer] fan, [AttackerName] sends an intense gust of wind billowing towards [TargetName], but [TargetHeOrShe] manages to brace [TargetHimOrHer]self in the face of the gale and stands [TargetHisOrHer] ground!
